column4: Do I need any type of virus protection or any other security stuff? I have Adblock+ and Better Privacy for Firefox.  Is anything else really necessary?
if you are not behind a firewalling router, you might consider a firewall
is firewall not on by default?  How do I configure a firewall?  I am behind a router, but it is a laptop and I travel.
no firewall is on by default, because there are very few open services by default, so if you don't install any services...
